metadata.title: CVE-2024-25742 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 6.9, an untrusted hypervisor can inject virtualinterrupt 29 (#VC) at any point in time and can trigger its handler. Thisaffects AMD SEV-SNP and AMD SEV-ES.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-25742` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-39-generic - 6.8.0-39.39
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-39-generic - 6.8.0-39.39
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-39-generic-64k - 6.8.0-39.39
No subscription required
